alert.note: Alert for Casper Mountain; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 03 at 3:50AM MDT until April 04 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Periods of heavy snow. Total snow accumulations of 15 to 20 inches. Accumulations on Casper Mountain could reach 24 to 36 inches. Significant blowing and drifting snow likely tonight and Tuesday from strong northeast winds. * WHERE...Natrona County Lower Elevations and Casper Mountain. * WHEN...Now until 6 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible, especially tonight through Tuesday morning, with near-blizzard conditions possible. Road closures are likely, and flight delays or cancellations are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow may melt during the afternoon, especially on paved surfaces, which could lead to a combination of wet and slick roads.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Casper Mountain; Natrona County Lower Elevations
